adHeader: $65/ph/2 guys and $85/ph/3 guys, licensed & insured moving service
adDetails: Multiple insurance protections: $2,000,000 General Liability Insurance, $750,000 Auto Insurance, $1,000,000 Workers' Comp Insurance, and $20,000 cargo insurance. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- We serve the san francico bayarea for over 10 years. We believe our rate and service are just what you like! Lowest rate: $65 /hour 2 guys with truck $85 /hour 3 guys with truck ( minimum 2 hours ) Time starts at your door and ends upon completion of your move. We are safe, fast, and reliable. We will protect your furniture and personal belongings with professional shrink-wrap and blankets. Customer's goods are insured without extra charge. Free professional shrink-wrap Free blankets No hidden charges or fees. PLEASE CALL show contact info
